hopobject.name: angstrom
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.9.0.2) Gecko/2008090514 Firefox/3.0.2
hopobject.body:
Angtrom Demo from Windows

Build the 'dd' image if you don't already have it

  • http://www.angstrom-distribution.org/demo/beagleboard/
  • http://www.beagleboard.org/uploads/angstrom-console-rd.gz
  • Use HP utility on the flash
  • setenv bootargs 'console=ttyS2,115200n8 console=tty0 root=/dev/ram0 rw ramdisk_size=32768 initrd=0x81600000,32M nohz=off'
setenv bootcmd 'mmcinit;fatload mmc 0 80300000 uImage;fatload mmc 0 81600000 angstrom-console-rd.gz;bootm 80300000'
saveenv

Write 'dd' image to the card
